name: v0.20.0
body:
WORKSPACE snippet:
```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "aspect_rules_jest",
    sha256 = "49c688e3838c855a9acf3b77bc25cfb18bdd70b03ff0810fbfd6353dd6055feb",
    strip_prefix = "rules_jest-0.20.0",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/releases/download/v0.20.0/rules_jest-v0.20.0.tar.gz",
)

####################
# aspect_rules_jest setup #
####################
# Fetches the aspect_rules_jest dependencies.
# If you want to have a different version of some dependency,
# you should fetch it *before* calling this.
# Alternatively, you can skip calling this function, so long as you've
# already fetched all the dependencies.

load("@aspect_rules_jest//jest:dependencies.bzl", "rules_jest_dependencies")

rules_jest_dependencies()

load("@rules_nodejs//nodejs:repositories.bzl", "DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION", "nodejs_register_toolchains")

nodejs_register_toolchains(
    name = "nodejs",
    node_version = DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION,
)

load("@aspect_rules_js//npm:npm_import.bzl", "npm_translate_lock")

npm_translate_lock(
    name = "npm",
    npmrc = "//:.npmrc",
    pnpm_lock = "//:pnpm-lock.yaml",
    verify_node_modules_ignored = "//:.bazelignore",
)

load("@npm//:repositories.bzl", "npm_repositories")

npm_repositories()
```


## What's Changed
* chore: update bcr maintainer list by @kormide in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/194
* chore: upgrade to Aspect Workflows 5.8.15 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/202
* chore: bring in aspect_rules_lint and add format task to Aspect Workflows by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/207
* chore: upgrade to buildifier pre-build 6.3.3 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/208
* chore: bazel run //:format by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/209
* chore: run Aspect Workflows setup step on small instances by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/211
* chore: use ARM instances for small runner group by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/213
* chore: enable workflows delivery on demostration target by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/214
* chore: switch to smaller 'small' instances without nvme drives by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/217
* chore: update Workflows Buildkite canonical pipeline examples by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/219
* chore: add managed grafana to Aspect Workflows deployment by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/223
* chore: reduce size of remote cache to tune deployment costs by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/225
* chore: enable workflows updates in code review thread by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/226
* chore: add external remote cache for local development by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/232
* feat: default cacheDirectory to TEST_TMPDIR by @sallustfire in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/231

## New Contributors
* @sallustfire made their first contribution in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/231

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/compare/v0.19.6...v0.20.0

name: v0.19.6
body:
WORKSPACE snippet:
```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "aspect_rules_jest",
    sha256 = "cae44cf7862b71f30c2ba6df6473bc8021c7a6c92c7d1771a58ebf5c99eb5776",
    strip_prefix = "rules_jest-0.19.6",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/releases/download/v0.19.6/rules_jest-v0.19.6.tar.gz",
)

####################
# aspect_rules_jest setup #
####################
# Fetches the aspect_rules_jest dependencies.
# If you want to have a different version of some dependency,
# you should fetch it *before* calling this.
# Alternatively, you can skip calling this function, so long as you've
# already fetched all the dependencies.

load("@aspect_rules_jest//jest:dependencies.bzl", "rules_jest_dependencies")

rules_jest_dependencies()

load("@rules_nodejs//nodejs:repositories.bzl", "DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION", "nodejs_register_toolchains")

nodejs_register_toolchains(
    name = "nodejs",
    node_version = DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION,
)

load("@aspect_rules_js//npm:npm_import.bzl", "npm_translate_lock")

npm_translate_lock(
    name = "npm",
    npmrc = "//:.npmrc",
    pnpm_lock = "//:pnpm-lock.yaml",
    verify_node_modules_ignored = "//:.bazelignore",
)

load("@npm//:repositories.bzl", "npm_repositories")

npm_repositories()
```


## What's Changed
* chore: update README so it slurps to docs.aspect.build by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/153
* chore: add Aspect Workflows CI (on AWS + Buildkite) by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/154
* chore: fix warming queue name in Aspect Workflows terraform by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/156
* chore: update to Aspect Workflows 5.7.0 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/159
* docs: add troubleshooting guide by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/160
* chore: update to Aspect Workflows 5.7.5 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/163
* chore: increase size, shards & replicates of the Aspect Workflows remote cache by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/166
* chore: enable Aspect Workflows k8s observability by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/169
* chore: set --remote_download_minimal and --nobuild_runfile_links for all Workflows tasks by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/172
* chore: bump remote cache to 384 gb by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/174
* chore: enable coverage on Workflows by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/175
* chore: update to Aspect CLI 5.7.2 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/178
* chore: set Workflows flags in .aspect/workflows/terraform/.bazelrc file by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/179
* chore: add gazelle task to Aspect Workflows config by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/180
* chore: upgrade to Aspect Workflows 5.8.2 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/187
* Add quotes around config path by @pwalker in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/152

## New Contributors
* @pwalker made their first contribution in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/152

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/compare/v0.19.5...v0.19.6

load("@rules_nodejs//nodejs:repositories.bzl", "DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION", "nodejs_register_toolchains")

## What's Changed
* fix: fixup windows test target filter to use target_compatible_with so it applies on BCR presumbit by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/149
* chore: bump CI workflows template to v3 which has the exclude attribute by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/150


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/compare/v0.19.4...v0.19.5

## What's Changed
* test: add jest_test(config) target tests by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/139
* ci: enable buildifier check on ci by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/140
* chore: disable buildifier on windows by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/141
* chore: bump rules_js dep to 1.29.2 to pickup Windows fix by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/143


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/compare/v0.19.2...v0.19.3

## What's Changed
* fix: enable coverage with COVERAGE_DIR env by @thesayyn in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/125
* fix: support split postprocessing by @thesayyn in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/132
* test: add js_library config tests by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/131
* feat: run snapshot updates as tests by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/133
* feat: update to rules_js 1.27.0 and pickup fixed_args feature by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/135

## New Contributors
* @thesayyn made their first contribution in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/125

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/compare/v0.18.4...v0.19.0

* fix: support jest config function by @panjiesw in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/127

## New Contributors

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/compare/v0.18.1...v0.18.3

* docs: expose jest_test rule, remove tags param by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/121
* fix: jest_test rule named the same as the macro by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/122
* fix: support jest config function by @panjiesw in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/127

## New Contributors
* @panjiesw made their first contribution in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/127

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/compare/v0.18.1...v0.18.2

name: v0.18.1
body:
For `WORKSPACE` users that are pinning `aspect_rules_js`, the rules_jest 0.18.x releases bump the minimum rules_js version required for rules_jest compatibility to [v1.24.0](https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/releases/tag/v1.24.0). `WORKSPACE` users that get rules_js transitively from `rules_jest_dependencies` are not affected. bzlmod users are also not affected since bzlmod ensure the minimum version of rules_js that rules_jest requires is used.

## WORKSPACE snippet

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "aspect_rules_jest",
    sha256 = "52dc08fd252add240124ef7ccc46df3a505121758dfb96578a3d5f2ebb4c2b40",
    strip_prefix = "rules_jest-0.18.1",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/releases/download/v0.18.1/rules_jest-v0.18.1.tar.gz",
)

####################
# aspect_rules_jest setup #
####################
# Fetches the aspect_rules_jest dependencies.
# If you want to have a different version of some dependency,
# you should fetch it *before* calling this.
# Alternatively, you can skip calling this function, so long as you've
# already fetched all the dependencies.

load("@aspect_rules_jest//jest:dependencies.bzl", "rules_jest_dependencies")

rules_jest_dependencies()

load("@rules_nodejs//nodejs:repositories.bzl", "DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION", "nodejs_register_toolchains")

nodejs_register_toolchains(
    name = "nodejs",
    node_version = DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION,
)

load("@aspect_rules_js//npm:npm_import.bzl", "npm_translate_lock")

npm_translate_lock(
    name = "npm",
    npmrc = "//:.npmrc",
    pnpm_lock = "//:pnpm-lock.yaml",
    verify_node_modules_ignored = "//:.bazelignore",
)

load("@npm//:repositories.bzl", "npm_repositories")

npm_repositories()
```


## What's Changed
* fix: don't add jest-cli and jest-unit if they are already in user provided data by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/120


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/compare/v0.18.0...v0.18.1

name: v0.18.0
body:
For `WORKSPACE` users that are pinning `aspect_rules_js`, this bumps the minimum rules_js version required for rules_jest compatibility to [v1.24.0](https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/releases/tag/v1.24.0). `WORKSPACE` users that get rules_js transitively from `rules_jest_dependencies` are not affected. bzlmod users are also not affected since bzlmod ensure the minimum version of rules_js that rules_jest requires is used.

## WORKSPACE snippet

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "aspect_rules_jest",
    sha256 = "e8b2714a27fbafed778c6a53e4294c8cf9ba9ffeca8d81ad76c7981a5f861f70",
    strip_prefix = "rules_jest-0.18.0",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/releases/download/v0.18.0/rules_jest-v0.18.0.tar.gz",
)

####################
# aspect_rules_jest setup #
####################
# Fetches the aspect_rules_jest dependencies.
# If you want to have a different version of some dependency,
# you should fetch it *before* calling this.
# Alternatively, you can skip calling this function, so long as you've
# already fetched all the dependencies.

load("@aspect_rules_jest//jest:dependencies.bzl", "rules_jest_dependencies")

rules_jest_dependencies()

load("@rules_nodejs//nodejs:repositories.bzl", "DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION", "nodejs_register_toolchains")

nodejs_register_toolchains(
    name = "nodejs",
    node_version = DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION,
)

load("@aspect_rules_js//npm:npm_import.bzl", "npm_translate_lock")

npm_translate_lock(
    name = "npm",
    npmrc = "//:.npmrc",
    pnpm_lock = "//:pnpm-lock.yaml",
    verify_node_modules_ignored = "//:.bazelignore",
)

load("@npm//:repositories.bzl", "npm_repositories")

npm_repositories()
```


## What's Changed
* chore: fix typo in docstring by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/118
* chore: bzlmod by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/113
* perf: use rules_js Bazel 6 optimized fs patches if using Bazel 6 and experimental_allow_unresolved_symlinks is on by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/119


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/compare/v0.17.0...v0.18.0

name: v0.17.0
body:
BREAKING CHANGES 

`jest_repositories` repository rule is removed and a new `node_modules` attribute is now required for `jest_test`. This change is BREAKING for all users.

The `//path/to:node_modules` tree target must be passed to the `jest_test` rules via the `node_modules` attribute. For example,

```
jest_test(
    name = "test",
    node_modules = "//:node_modules",
    ...
)
```

You'll need `jest-cli` and `jest-junit` linked in the node_modules tree provided. The `jest-junit` requirement can be removed by setting `auto_configure_reporters = False` on your `jest_test` targets.

This change has the added benefits of not requiring users to keep the jest version used in their `package.json` in sync with their WORKSPACE and not requiring any changes to `rules_jest` to support new releases of jest.

This change is in the spirit of the change in rules_webpack [v0.11.0](https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/releases/tag/v0.11.0), rules_jasmine [v0.4.0](https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/releases/tag/v0.4.0), rules_rollup [v0.14.0](https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_rollup/releases/tag/v0.14.0) and rules_terser [v0.14.0](https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_terser/releases/tag/v0.14.0) so the patterns on the downstream rules_js rulesets we maintain are aligned both for maintainers and for users.

## WORKSPACE snippet

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "aspect_rules_jest",
    sha256 = "a2f35eedce1a59f94b2158b056caab09ed66b92cafabd631b25dac78a178e044",
    strip_prefix = "rules_jest-0.17.0",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/releases/download/v0.17.0/rules_jest-v0.17.0.tar.gz",
)

####################
# aspect_rules_jest setup #
####################
# Fetches the aspect_rules_jest dependencies.
# If you want to have a different version of some dependency,
# you should fetch it *before* calling this.
# Alternatively, you can skip calling this function, so long as you've
# already fetched all the dependencies.

load("@aspect_rules_jest//jest:dependencies.bzl", "rules_jest_dependencies")

rules_jest_dependencies()

load("@rules_nodejs//nodejs:repositories.bzl", "DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION", "nodejs_register_toolchains")

nodejs_register_toolchains(
    name = "nodejs",
    node_version = DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION,
)

load("@aspect_rules_js//npm:npm_import.bzl", "npm_translate_lock")

npm_translate_lock(
    name = "npm",
    npmrc = "//:.npmrc",
    pnpm_lock = "//:pnpm-lock.yaml",
    verify_node_modules_ignored = "//:.bazelignore",
)

load("@npm//:repositories.bzl", "npm_repositories")

npm_repositories()
```


## What's Changed
* refactor: remove vendored jest versions; user must provider their own jest-cli from their node_modules by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/117


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/compare/v0.16.2...v0.17.0

name: v0.16.2
body:
WORKSPACE snippet:
```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "aspect_rules_jest",
    sha256 = "2f62b6356afd2b04a2bd6298e19aaf031b001f79af42c7081b9001d71a9d9602",
    strip_prefix = "rules_jest-0.16.2",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/releases/download/v0.16.2/rules_jest-v0.16.2.tar.gz",
)

####################
# rules_jest setup #
####################
# Fetches the rules_jest dependencies.
# If you want to have a different version of some dependency,
# you should fetch it *before* calling this.
# Alternatively, you can skip calling this function, so long as you've
# already fetched all the dependencies.
load("@aspect_rules_jest//jest:dependencies.bzl", "rules_jest_dependencies")

rules_jest_dependencies()

# Fetches the npm packages for jest-cli.
load("@aspect_rules_jest//jest:repositories.bzl", "jest_repositories")

jest_repositories(name = "jest")

load("@jest//:npm_repositories.bzl", jest_npm_repositories = "npm_repositories")

jest_npm_repositories()

# Register a nodejs toolchain, if you haven't already done so.
load("@rules_nodejs//nodejs:repositories.bzl", "DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION", "nodejs_register_toolchains")

nodejs_register_toolchains(
    name = "nodejs",
    node_version = DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION,
)
```


## What's Changed
* chore: update snapshots hint by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/104
* chore: update to aspect_bazel_lib 1.27.2 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/106
* chore: update to Aspect CLI 5.2.0-rc0 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/108
* chore: update to Aspect CLI 5.2.1 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/109
* fix: timeout/size shouldn't be passed to js_binary  by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/110
* fix: remove other attributes that don't belong on js_binary by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/111
* chore: update dependencies by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/112
* fix: also pass data to js_binary tool for jest snapshot updates by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/114
* fix: env is valid for js_test, js_binary and js_run_binary by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/115
* test: add test case for #114 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/116


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/compare/v0.16.1...v0.16.2

* fix: support jest_test(config) dependencies, add esm tests by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/83
* feat: vendor package.json files per version for rules_js v1.17.0 support by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/97
* chore: update to rules_js 1.17.0 and aspect_bazel_lib 1.24.2 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/98

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "aspect_rules_jest",
    sha256 = "b5bf5f740da458fc3199264be6ef7acb74ddbdc30b4a7f75503e5e164e6c1781",
    strip_prefix = "rules_jest-0.14.0",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/archive/refs/tags/v0.14.0.tar.gz",
)

####################
# rules_jest setup #
####################
# Fetches the rules_jest dependencies.
# If you want to have a different version of some dependency,
# you should fetch it *before* calling this.
# Alternatively, you can skip calling this function, so long as you've
# already fetched all the dependencies.
load("@aspect_rules_jest//jest:dependencies.bzl", "rules_jest_dependencies")

rules_jest_dependencies()

# Fetches the npm packages for jest-cli.
load("@aspect_rules_jest//jest:repositories.bzl", "jest_repositories")

jest_repositories(name = "jest")

load("@jest//:npm_repositories.bzl", jest_npm_repositories = "npm_repositories")

jest_npm_repositories()

# Register a nodejs toolchain, if you haven't already done so.
load("@rules_nodejs//nodejs:repositories.bzl", "DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION", "nodejs_register_toolchains")

nodejs_register_toolchains(
    name = "nodejs",
    node_version = DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION,
)
```

## What's Changed
* feat: add snapshot support with write_source_files snapshot update target by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/62
* chore: add jest versions v28.1.1 through v29.3.1 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/67
* chore: add examples of using esm with jest_test both .mjs files and with 'type':'module' in package.json by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/66
* chore: use Aspect CLI 5.0.2 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/74
* feat: add support for updating __snapshots__ directories from output directory artifacts by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/73
* chore: update to rules_js 1.10.0 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/75
* chore: update to rules_js 1.11.0 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/76


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/compare/v0.12.1...v0.13.0
